vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Σαλά, ὁ indecl. (Heb. שֶׁלַח),
Sala, Shalah: Luk.3:32 (R, txt., Σαλμών, which see), Luk.3:35.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Rut.4.20;
son of: Nahshon (H5177);
husband of: Rahab (H7343);
father of: Boaz (H1162); also called Sala at Luk.3.32;
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Selá/Selaj: (1) padre of Booz (LUK.3:32) ; (2) padre of Heber/Éber (LUC.3:35)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
沙拉 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "發芽"
t亞法撒的兒子, 希伯的父親 (路 3:35)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
沙拉 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "发芽"
t亚法撒的儿子, 希伯的父亲 (路 3:35)
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: Sa-la có những bản cổ khác chép, « Sanh-môn »

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.24;
son of: Cainan (G2536);
father of: Eber (H5677)
